Package eg.edittools

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddableEditTool
    The interface to create an "edit tool" that has access to the currently viewed EditableDocument and whose view can be added to the ToolPanel in the main window
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExchangeEditor
    The AddableEditTool for the editing and viewing of text in a separate text area
    Finder
    The AddableEditTool for finding and replacing text
    TextExchange
    The exchange of text between one EditableDocument set in the constructor and a settable object of EditableDocument.
    TextSearch
    The search and maybe replacemant of text or words in the EditableDocument that is currently viewed in the main editor area
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EditTools
    Constants that identify implementations of AddableEditTool
